storyInfo: In the middle of the battle with the mysterious Seaborn, the true master of the ship appears. The decades have not robbed him of his human mind, but he refuses to acknowledge reality, and views the past with anger.

attributes.content: Tch... the further in we go, the more Sea Terrors there are.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: It's getting dangerous...
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Maestro... how do I become like them...?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Gkh...
Seaborn?!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: (It's the same one we saw on the deck. The Hunter's attacks didn't do any damage?!)
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: (How will it come at me? With its limbs? Its fangs?)
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: (My handcannon... I need to create distanceâ€”)
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Wait a second! What's that on your belt?!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Why would you... could you be...?!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Graaaahhhh!!
Argh! *Cough*
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: (What strength! I barely managed to block it!)
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Do you have something to say, monster?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: I can't go down here... I won't!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: I'm an Inquisitor of Iberia!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: *Cough*...
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: It has taken too long to burn away the nethersea brand.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: The situation's not looking good.
attributes.name: High Inquisitor Dario

attributes.content: (Numerous slithering sounds)
attributes.name: Sea Terror

attributes.content: (I can see what's going on down there from here.)
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: How many hours have passed? How much longer can he hang on?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: I... if I... no, don't think about it, Jordi. Focus!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: The Inquisition... Hurry...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Is that all?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Grr...
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: Listen to your friends wail. The flower of Sal Viento at least had its beauty, but what about you?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: As my first dance lesson after waking up, I must say you're underwhelming.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Gkh!
attributes.name: Seaborn

attributes.content: It's getting away!
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I'll go after it. You go find the little Iberian bird.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: How are you feeling?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Better than ever. My memories are tumbling down like a waterfall from the heavens. It'll take a while for the full picture to emerge, though.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: And some of my more recent memories are rather embarrassing.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I'll go. Your mind is still unstable.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Oh? Trying to steal my prey?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It'll try to escape to the sea.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Of course it will. But it wasn't running just because it couldn't win.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: What did it find?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: We don't have timeâ€”
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: *cough* I'll never get used to handcannons.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Hey, where are youâ€”
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Huh? The Abyssal Hunters?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Hello, Irene. I see you've brought us more prey.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Did you just call me Irene? Have you... have you regained your memories?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Not entirely, but I know I'm in a great mood right now.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: This is not the time.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: That's the one from the deck. It's fast enough to dodge the captain's lunge.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: I really must tip my hat to you, Irene. For chasing it all the way here without taking a scratch.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I can't take credit for it. It hardly even attacked. Look, it's still not, even now.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: I see... I thought it wouldn't be able to resist if we chatted like this and showed it an opening.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Your friend just left, you know. It's not too late to go after them.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Or are you a pacifist too?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: (Kazimierz, a landlocked country where Skadi stayed for a time. A place of sprawling grasslands and forests, the Land of Knights.)
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: (Knights...)
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Is it a coincidence? Or did something draw him there?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: This ship, Breogan. What did you intend to leave behind for your homeland? Where have you hidden the answer?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: ...Hmm.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: (Sea Terror carcasses? And not only that...)
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: (The wounds are clean and precise. They show no signs of resistance. Scents mingle in the air. The air here is stale.)
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: (What else is there on this ship?)
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Your belt and pocket watch are undoubtedly human in origin, and even in the Iberian style!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: What are you?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: It's stalling for time.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: This will get complicated if the other one gets back to the ocean.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Still not attacking? What a passive dance partner.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I'll take the lead, Skadi.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: â€”Guh!
Guh... grrrr... gah...
Come on, fight back already. I'm starting to feel like the bad guy.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: It's not stalling for time!
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: The sound of bells?! What?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: (Sharp screech)
Bells echo through the empty hall.
The lights in the hall flash. The Seaborn lands in the direction of the throne while the three are distracted.
Yes, the throne.
There is a throne on this Iberian ship. A symbol of pride, power, arrogance, and deceit.
It's like...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Specter trails off, knowing what she was about to say was far too absurd.
It wears a crown, and drapes itself in the same colors as the curtains. It kneels by the side of the throne, the two inextricably bonded with one another.
It resembles the queens and ministers of old, serving the golden sun of Iberia.
A silhouette emerges from behind the throne.
Irene raises her lantern over her head, trying to illuminate the shadowy figure.
Why do you set foot on my ship?
attributes.name: Seaborn?

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* Pah.
attributes.name: Seaborn?

attributes.content: Who would ignore a question from the great Alfonso? Why are you here?
attributes.name: Seaborn?

attributes.content: Why have you broken the silence, and come for MY Iberia, which had lain forgotten for decades?
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: I will start with you. Answer me, child of Old Iberia.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: Irene could not believe her eyes.
She'd seen the Seaborn's face before. She had devoted much time of her time during her Inquisitor training to the study of history, immersing herself in doctrines and creeds.
How dare this Seaborn claim to be Alfonso?
How dare it claim to be Iberia's greatest ship captain?
â€”You, you can't possibly be the captain of this ship, monster!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Alfonso was almost fifty years-old sixty years ago, but you look even younger than the great hero was back then!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Irene knows she is shaken, but she cannot show weakness.
She reflexively raises her lantern, as her commanding officer would have.
Drop the mask, Seaborn!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: The light of her lantern flickers. The tiny speck in the Inquisitor's hand seems to fit the word 'lost' better than the lights of this golden hall.
The Golden Age.
The 'Seaborn' briefly lays its eyes on Irene before turning away dismissively, rubbing 'Alfonso's' inhuman arm.
A short silence surrounds the hero.
'Seaborn'? I don't like that name.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: Tell me your name, child of Old Iberia.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: I am Irene, Inquisitor of Iberia.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: And 'Old Iberia'? You dare defile the name ofâ€”
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: And you dare talk to me like that?!
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: (A screech interrupts the exchange)
Agh!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Where were you when we burned Victoria's ships and sunk the Lion King's honor to the bottom of the lake?
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: Where were you when I paved the streets of Sal Viento with pure gold, brought back in my ships?
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: Where were you when the Tercios darkened Leithanien's dawn like a black cloud?
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: Youâ€”
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: (Violent coughing) *cough* *cough* Pah.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: I am Alfonso, Duke of Old Iberia, Admiral of the Armada, Captain of the Stultifera, and King of my own kingdom. You, a mere Inquisitor, dare question me?
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: ...(Shakes head impatiently)
So the church's fools have crossed the ocean to find me. What did you expect, a pat on the back?
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: Go back. No matter how you got here, the Stultifera Navis does not welcome you. Garcia, my chief mate... no need be so bothered by them.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: They will repay the sea a thousand fold for the blood they made you spill.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: Ah... (Nods)
attributes.name: Chief Mate

attributes.content: Mocking the Inquisition is a serious crime in Iberia.
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Did you not understand what I just said? Leave. There is not a single living soul on this ship, child of Old Iberia.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: We've sacrificed so much toâ€”!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: â€”I'm not here to ask for your permission!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Such impertinence. This is why I never liked the church.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: A crime? Against a church too helpless to stand against even the feeble royal house?
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: If you're really from Old Iberia, then tell me. Who is the incumbent pope? Carmen?
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: ...You know Saint Carmen's name?
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: Saint? A saint? Ha...
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: Haha... A saint... Hahaha.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: What are you laughing at?!
attributes.name: Inquisitor Irene

attributes.content: He didn't even have the mettle to become pope? Does he not feel ashamed when he sees himself in the mirror?
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: No wonder it took you sixty years to find this place. It seems disaster has made Iberia weak.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: But no matter. Before the ship's doctor joined the corals, we discussed what might have become of Iberia. This is not unexpected.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: The floor that you stand on, this immaculate golden hallâ€”THIS is the motherland I know.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: THIS is Iberia, not the backwater you speak of, half of which you refuse to see or understand.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: How far has the once-great empire fallen? Is it really so pathetic that it took you sixty years to find me?
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: Alfonso descends from the podium.
Irene takes a step back. Her lantern flickers.
Now then, why are there two Ã†gir with you? There is no place for the Ã†gir in my Iberia.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: We meant no offense, Captain. We were merely chasing some ugly monsters, and mistook your chief mate for one of them.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: ...How did you survive so long here?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: That's the question, ain't it, you Ã†gir fools? It's been so, so many years since I took up hunting, as a hobby. Either today or tomorrow should've been the day of reckoning.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: But you chased away my quarry. Now we must once again rely on thoseâ€”
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: â€”No. Wait... no!
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: You... you are not Ã†gir! You're more than Ã†gir! Both of you!
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: What's your name?
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: ...Skadi.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: No, no. No no no, Ã†gir. Don't try to deceive me. We may have been trapped on this ship for decades, but we are no fools.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: They call you Ishar-mla.
attributes.name: Captain Alfonso

attributes.content: Did you hear the bells, Ulpianus?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: It's a miracle that anything works on this ship at all.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Here, the bells signal the start of the hunt.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: But who's the hunter, and who's the prey?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: The children of the ocean don't care. If they consider Alfonso to be their kinâ€”albeit weakenedâ€”they're willing to offer their own flesh and blood, all to ensure the survival of the strong.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: A Hunter approaches.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Gladiia. She's too sharp. The skills I learned on land will only work for so long. She'll detect me soon.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: What will you do?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: What will YOU do?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Answering a question with a question? I... I'm interested in your choice, Ulpianus.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: I never expected to become interested in the Abyssal Hunters again, but Laurentina fascinates me. I see so much possibility in her.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: And you, you've made your choice of your own accord, while retaining your sanity. Have you noticed? More and more, you're becoming like one of us.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: Can you reach the truth? Cast aside revelation, lay open the body of god, and learn the truth of the gods of the sea?
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: The answer you're seeking is tantalizing. Heh, look at me, showing curiosity. Perhaps there's something human in me yet.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: The revelation is imprinted upon the instincts of god's children. Our ways of thinking couldn't be more different.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Oh my.
attributes.name: Amaia

attributes.content: You sound even more like a Seaborn than I do.
attributes.name: Amaia
